name: Matt Toland
background_summary: Matt Toland is a Data Scientist with a background in Mechanical Engineering (MEng, Queen's University Belfast) and a subsequent specialisation in Big Data Analytics & Artificial Intelligence (PG Diploma with a first, Atlantic Technological University). He began his career at Accenture, progressing from Data Engineering Analyst to Data Science Consultant over approximately 3.5 years, gaining experience in both Dublin and London. In August 2024, he joined FLIGHTSTORY as a Data Scientist and was recently promoted to Senior Data Scientist in May 2025.

previous_companies.description: Gained experience in both Dublin and London

public_speaking_or_content.title: My work got featured in The Sunday Times

investment_criteria_assessment.assessment_summary: Based on structured output from research_prospect_tool
